title: LoL keeps crashing when I'm in game, while other games never crash.
body:
It has been happening a lot lately, and I'm afraid that I will be banned temp. because of it.
I just start a normal game, and it crashes without any error/message like ''UPDATE NEEDED" or something like that.
What can I do to fix this? It's giving me a lot of trouble.

replies.body: Do you ever see any kind of error whatsoever when it crashes or does the game just not load correctly? If it's crashing randomly without any kind of error message, it could be due to corrupted files somewhere in the installation. Try running a quick repair and let me know if that helps. If not, try to explain exactly what happened when things go wrong.
Oh sorry, I forgot to mention something else. My laptop also crashes while in game. It just restarts without any error/message.

Hmmmm that makes this sound a little more serious than just a problem with LoL. Overheating from games can sometimes cause laptops to crash and shutdown unexpectedly. I'd first clean out those fans and check to see if it's getting unreasonably hot lately.
